name: Real Bocce Pro
description:
Ultra-realistic physics, beautiful sceneries and different balls with their own characteristics make Real Bocce the most realistic Bocce/Petanque simulation.

-Multiplayer mode : play against friend on same device
-Hyper-intuitives controls
-Point or shoot
-Throw sitting or standing
-Make lobs
-Choose amongst 6 sceneries and 6 balls
-Check your rank on the Leaderboard

Game in English
